extendedInfo.description: Magnificent Live Wallpapers. The heavenly roar of the great and devine Gold Dragon opens the fate of the night with thunderbolt strikes."Dream Monday Family" can also use the wallpapers of this app.We recommend "Dream Monday Family" to the customer who purchased some our live wallpapers and want to use many wallpaper.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dmf.wall.DMFLwpSub*To use:Menu>Wallpapers>LiveWallpapers->Ryujin Legend Lightning*Portrait only.*Please try the free version first.https://market.android.com/details?id=com.dmf.wall.RyujinLegendFree*The scrolling depends behavior of Home application.If scrolling does not work or something strange, try to check Home app's settings.(scrolling speed, overshoot, etc.)*Please resetting if the screen turn black when updating it with setting the wallpaper.

reviews.title: Update changed this..
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t look the same as it did. Has a \"grainy-like\" appearance. And my phone is HD... not happy, as this was one of my fav. ones!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: July 6 update fixed previous July 2 update
reviews.comment: Thank you for fixing the July 2 update.  This new update resolves all issues and goes back to being how it was before: working- simple and straightforward, no confusion and no mess.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Thank you for making it so that those of u who bought the app before that update can now use it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dramatic & Realistic
reviews.comment: I think this is a most realistic dragon lwp. Beautiful yellow gold dragon might swallow up bad boys with attitude!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Amazing but needs to work on the battery use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What joke.
reviews.comment: Sucks dick, fken eat up my battery like a mfer. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome... I love orientals specially dragons!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works perfectly now! Thanks for the update! Once again: Awesome dragon! Awesome app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The dragon looks so magnificent. I will pray for Japan. I got it for both of my phones.
reviews.author: A Google User
